title: Prohibition in sports arenas, outdoor arenas, stadiums, and amphitheaters
context: [ยง328J-5] Prohibition in sports arenas, outdoor arenas, stadiums, and amphitheaters. Smoking shall be prohibited in the enclosed or partially enclosed areas and in seating areas of sports arenas, outdoor arenas, stadiums, and amphitheaters. [L 2006, c 295, pt of ยง2]
